reviewText: Disappointed wouldn't play in my DVD player.
Its not the shipper or the movie its the fact it did not state I would not be able to play this in the USA.  my father-n-law is really disappointed.

When I put the disc in my DVD player there was nothing there.
I didn't know how to return return because there was no shipping invoice in the envelope.

What do you suggest on me returning the movie? Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you.
